name: incompatibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that cannot exist or work with another person or thing because of basic differences: incompatibly with It is unlawful for public authorities to act incompatibly with the rights set out in the Convention. The individual interpretations of readers differ, sometimes incompatibly.
More examplesFewer examplesOne has to wonder about the almost incompatibly diverse audiences the project is trying to attract. The court cannot act incompatibly with the Human Rights Act.They use these key terms differently and sometimes incompatibly.
